___tags.description: Tags to apply to CloudFormation template

___s3_bucket.description: Name of S3 bucket to upload project to, if left out a bucket will be auto-generated

___template.description: path to template file relative to the project config file path

___parameters.description: Parameter key-values to pass to CloudFormation, parameters provided in global config take precedence

___az_blacklist.description: List of Availablilty Zones ID's to exclude when generating availability zones

___s3_bucket.description: Name of S3 bucket to upload project to, if left out a bucket will be auto-generated

___tags.description: Tags to apply to CloudFormation template

___parameters.description: Parameter key-values to pass to CloudFormation, parameters provided in global config take precedence

___lambda_source_path.description: Path relative to the project root containing Lambda zip files, default is 'lambda_functions/source'

___tags.description: Tags to apply to CloudFormation template

___s3_bucket.description: Name of S3 bucket to upload project to, if left out a bucket will be auto-generated

___template.description: path to template file relative to the project config file path

___parameters.description: Parameter key-values to pass to CloudFormation, parameters provided in global config take precedence

___az_blacklist.description: List of Availablilty Zones ID's to exclude when generating availability zones

___name.description: Project name, used as s3 key prefix when uploading objects

___build_submodules.description: Build Lambda zips recursively for submodules, set to false to disable

___lambda_zip_path.description: Path relative to the project root to place Lambda zip files, default is 'lambda_functions/zips'

___s3_enable_sig_v2.description: Enable (deprecated) sigv2 access to auto-generated buckets

___shorten_stack_name.description: Shorten stack names generated for tests, set to true to enable

___package_lambda.description: Package Lambda functions into zips before uploading to s3, set to false to disable

___owner.description: email address for project owner (not used at present)

___s3_object_acl.description: ACL for uploaded s3 objects, defaults to 'private'

___s3_bucket.description: Name of S3 bucket to upload project to, if left out a bucket will be auto-generated

___parameters.description: Parameter key-values to pass to CloudFormation, parameters provided in global config take precedence
